name: Thirsty Man
description:
Note: Download version is of higher quality


W - Move forwards

A - Move left

S - Move backwards

D - Move right

E - Interact with objects

Escape - Pause the game

Mouse - Look around

A room, an intense thirst, and insomnia. John Yakuza stars as Thirsty Man in this action thriller with an added twist to appeal to those with a refined taste in gaming.

  • Search your apartment
  • Uncover the truth
  • Get a glass of water
  • Experience... everything...

Become action hero John Yakuza and jump into his experience being a thirsty man. Get out of bed, get a glass of water and go to bed… It’s a simple task isn’t it? But it's not what it seems… So, can you… un-thirsty the man? 

Made as a submission to Brackeys Game Jam 2023.1

An original game by Studio D.R.A.G.O.N. with:

  • Voice acting by TheShinyRoaster and Lostie (Music on all platforms)
  •  An original OST by TheShinyRoaster
  • Expert character and room designs by ScreenBarrage
  • Detailed modelling by TheShinyRoaster
  • Advanced programming by TheShinyRoaster 

This is a game you don’t want to miss out on… Now, it's time to put all your worries to rest...
